name: 火箭星战
detailed_description:
”Star-Rocket Strike”
When you see the starry sky and the cartoon rockets，
This is my original indie game work : ”Star-Rocket Strike”.
”Star-Rocket Strike” is a third-person shooter game which combines astrology and rockets.
The current version is 1.1.
It's far from the quality of my ideal work,
but I think the current version is interesting and unique.
During the game development, many friends support and give me advice.
I hereby express my sincere thanks.
If you have any Suggestions or comments,
Please contact me by this platform.
Game ideas and features:
[the list]
  • unique constellation science and rocket combination mode, later plan to introduce the human nature of constellation characteristics into computer intelligent script,
    Giving the machine the humanistic care that allows the player to have the unique behavior of the constellation characteristics,
    For example, the white sheep type rocket impulse, the lion model rocket is arrogant, the virgin model rocket is critical.
  • the third person is shooting at the Angle of view, optimizing the method of ballistic shooting, and reducing the amount of dizziness and discomfort caused by 3D games to users.
  • new research ammunition system, introducing controlled interest ammunition, and adding original constellation ammunition to make every game happy and easy.
  • the cartoon style of the painting style with the lighting of the roasting scene, the design of the door of the design of the location, show a developer to improve the scene internal structure.
  • in the traditional team sports mode, we will be able to participate in the survivor's competitive mode, and feel the difficulty of surviving in the flying of the ammunition.[/ list]
    Official discussion on QQ group: 264690383, welcome to join, discuss and discuss together.

short_description:
”Star-Rocket Strike” is a third-person cartoon-style shooting game which combines astrology and rocket elements.
Try to attack the enemy with each characteristic ammo, protect the partner, enjoy the free shooting adventure together! [/ b]
